alert.note: Alert for Rabun (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 19 at 12:00AM EDT until July 19 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL RABUN AND CENTRAL MACON COUNTIES... At 1200 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southeast of Franklin, or 5 miles west of Highlands, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Franklin, Mountain City, Dillard, Sky Valley, Scaly Mountain, Burningtown, Otto, Cullasaja and Cowee. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
